title: 17 Zig Ziglar Quotes That Will Inspire You to Achieve More and Be More
description: Zig Ziglar’s enduring wisdom will help you create and keep the success you so richly deserve.
author: Peter Economy
excerpt: Zig Ziglar’s enduring wisdom will help you create and keep the success you so richly deserve.
text: Quotes are a great source of inspiration, guidance, and self-improvement. They can make us think differently and push us to become better versions of ourselves. We all want to succeed, and the good news is, we all can.Zig Ziglar’s enduring wisdom is a wealth of information on how to create and keep the success you so richly deserve. These 17 quotes will help you reach for what you want, overcome the hurdles that stand in your way, and stay positive throughout the process.1. “Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.”2. “Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.”3. “If you can dream it, then you can achieve it. You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want.”4. “Remember that failure is an event, not a person.”5. “What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.”6. “You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.”7. “In the game of life, before you get anything out, you must put something in!”8. “It’s not what you’ve got, it’s what you use that makes a difference.”9. “You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.”10. “Success must never be measured by how much money you have.”11. “Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.”12. “Goals enable you to do more for yourself and others, too.”13. “You cannot climb the ladder of success dressed in the costume of failure.”14. “The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love, and loyalty.”15. “You can make positive deposits in your own economy every day by reading and listening to powerful, positive, life-changing content and by associating with encouraging and hope-building people.”16. “Honesty and integrity are absolutely essential for success in life—all areas of life. The really good news is that anyone can develop both honesty and integrity.”17. “If you don’t see yourself as a winner, then you cannot perform as a winner.”The opinions expressed here by Inc.com columnists are their own, not those of Inc.com.
html:
Quotes are a great source of inspiration, guidance, and self-improvement. They can make us think differently and push us to become better versions of ourselves. We all want to succeed, and the good news is, we all can.

Zig Ziglar’s enduring wisdom is a wealth of information on how to create and keep the success you so richly deserve. These 17 quotes will help you reach for what you want, overcome the hurdles that stand in your way, and stay positive throughout the process.

1. “Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.”

2. “Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.”

3. “If you can dream it, then you can achieve it. You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want.”

4. “Remember that failure is an event, not a person.”

5. “What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.”

6. “You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.”

7. “In the game of life, before you get anything out, you must put something in!”

8. “It’s not what you’ve got, it’s what you use that makes a difference.”

9. “You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.”

10. “Success must never be measured by how much money you have.”

11. “Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.”

12. “Goals enable you to do more for yourself and others, too.”

13. “You cannot climb the ladder of success dressed in the costume of failure.”

14. “The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love, and loyalty.”

15. “You can make positive deposits in your own economy every day by reading and listening to powerful, positive, life-changing content and by associating with encouraging and hope-building people.”

16. “Honesty and integrity are absolutely essential for success in life—all areas of life. The really good news is that anyone can develop both honesty and integrity.”

17. “If you don’t see yourself as a winner, then you cannot perform as a winner.”

The opinions expressed here by Inc.com columnists are their own, not those of Inc.com.
